QuestData.Title: Dead Elves Walking
QuestData.Description: D-did you hear that? Ghosts! I hate ghosts!$b$bTheir eerie howls are coming from the barrows to the south. Ahhh! Make them stop!!$b$bPlease, $gmister:missy; I'll pay good money to get those voices out of my head!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy any 15 of the night elf ghosts at Dor'danil Barrow Den.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you rid the barrows of the ghosts?
QuestData.RewardText: Woohooo!!$b$bYou've silenced the voices! Thank you, thank you!
